import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useInView } from "react-intersection-observer"; import Slider from "react-slick"; const Main = () => { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const { ref, inView } = useInView ({ threshold: 0.5, triggerOnce: true, }); const sliderSettings = { dots: true, infinite: true, fade: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 3000, arrows: false, cssEase: "linear", afterChange: (index) => setCurrentSlide(index), // Update slide aktif }; const slides = [ { id: 1, backgroundImage: "/assets/bg_1.jpg", title: "The Best Coffee Testing Experience", description: "A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia.", }, { id: 2, backgroundImage: "/assets/bg_2.jpg", title: "Amazing Taste & Beautiful Place", description: "A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia.", }, { id: 3, backgroundImage: "/assets/bg_3.jpg", title: "Creamy Hot and Ready to Serve", description: "A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia.", }, ]; return (
{slides.map((slide, index) => (
Welcome

{slide.title}

{slide.description}

Order Now {" "} View Menu

))}

); }; export default Main;
